author: Staff Reporter
text:
A rally creating awareness among voters about their rights and responsibilities was organised on January 25 – which was observed as National Voters Day – at Cheyyar. The rally was flagged off by Dr. T. Prabhu Shankar, sub-collector, Cheyyar. Around 800 students from colleges participated. About 200 of these students formed a human chain.

Wearing badges on National Voters Day, conductors of MTC buses created awareness about voting among the passengers. At the government hospital and primary health centres, out-patient slips were issued with a seal carrying a message on voting.

About 200 college students formed a human chain creating awareness about voting
title: National Voters Day observed
